loach.ui.midp2.screen.match
Class MatchScreen

java.lang.Object
  loach.ui.midp2.screen.MIDP2Screen
      loach.ui.midp2.screen.match.MatchScreen
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, MatchEventListener, WormEventListener, KeyListener, Paintable, Disposable
public final class MatchScreen
extends MIDP2Screen
implements KeyListener, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener, MatchEventListener, Paintable, WormEventListener

LoachM - GameScreen This represents the match screen, where the human-controlled worm and CPU worms duke it out on the battlefield.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Chris Dennett
